I will also not be upgrading my phone at Vodacom this August and also from August not buy any data from vodacom anymore, if you can't help someone with a simple issue like a email password that is not working why should I support you? Anyway vodacom services has went down the drain since all your pricws droppes since the court case you have. Would rather spend more money somewhere else for a better service.
